nodes.bodyText: I'd like to have more informative docs. Not sure if you were planning on adding that later.
I think we can just say using the URL (or endpoint) and pipeline of the passed client. I don't think we need to specify that we use the getters.
Are we planning on adding options? Or should we change the doc?
